title: Braum's Shield brings early Blood Moon Zilean Effects
body:
110% reproduction Rate
Steps:
1. Must have {{champion:26}}  and {{champion:201}}  on opposite sides (does not work with allies)
2. {{champion:201}} Must use Shield
3. While {{champion:201}}  is using his shield {{champion:26}}  must use his Bomb
if this is done then the bomb should have Blood Moon {{champion:26}}  effect

replies.body: Honestly if you wanted to give me the Blood Moon {{champion:26}} for free you coulda just said so ;)

Hey Calad! 

Thanks for the report! We'll see why the base is stealing Blood Moon Zilean's particles.
{{champion:26}} is truly a time traveler as he managed to go to the future when Blood Moon was out and steal the bomb effects and come back in time.

Just want to add that the particles look sick! Was fun playing the game while we could. 
Guess we will have to wait till it comes out now...
